Title: Series: Library of Ashurbanipal
Description: Fragment of a clay tablet, Ashurbanipal Tyrian and Egypt, 12 + 13 lines of inscription. Neo-Assyrian.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir Austen Henry Layard (et al)
Bibliographic references: Bezold 1891a / Catalogue of the cuneiform tablets in the Kouyunjik Collection of the British Museum
